changelog.chg: league info is updated live from metadata now
heists are auto tagged as blueprint, if 3 or more rouqes appear
BUGFIX: application did not start after first time setup due to duplicate dependencies
BUGFIX: side areas where not calculated correctly
New setting for hide main windows to system tray when minimized
Indicator that data filtering is active on top notification bar
Bugfix tags created in activity details were not added to filter box
Fixed a bug that causes an application crash when trying to filter data or show summary
Fixed a bug that causes an application crash when filtering with empty list boxes
Added Sanctum Tracking (new activity type and 2 new stats). Needs logfile reload for history.
Added Tanes Laboratory Tracking (new activity type). Needs logfile reload for history
